SEARCH
Package ru.nsu.berezin.blackjack

Interface GameInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
RuWriterReaderInterface
public interface GameInterface
Game interface. It reacts to various game events and provides a way for the player to interact with the game. It shouldn't mutate the game state. Game state only passed so that interface can use state to determine, what to show to the player.

  • Method Details

    • setGameState

      void setGameState(GameState state)
      Sets the game state. Every other callback will be called only when the event happens in the state that is passed to this method.
      Parameters:
      state - - state of the game. It should not be mutated by the interface.

    • gameStarted

      void gameStarted()
      Called once when game starts.

    • roundStarted

      void roundStarted()
      Called when round starts. State is the state of the game at the start of the round. `state.currentRound` is the number of the round that is starting.

    • firstHandDealt

      void firstHandDealt()
      Called when the first hand of the round is dealt. You can access it using `state.dealer`.

    • playerTurnStarted

      void playerTurnStarted()
      Called when player turn starts, right after `firstHandDealt`.

    • requestPlayerAction

      Game.Action requestPlayerAction()
      Called every time player is tasked with selecting an Action.
      Returns:
      - action to perform

    • cardIsDealtToPlayer

      void cardIsDealtToPlayer(Card dealt)
      Called every time the card is dealt to player. Happens if player chooses `Action.DrawMore`.
      Parameters:
      dealt - - card that was dealt to player

    • playerTurnEnded

      void playerTurnEnded()
      Called when player's turn ends. Happens if player chooses `Action.Stop`.

    • dealerTurnStarted

      void dealerTurnStarted()
      Called when dealer's turn starts.

    • dealerOpensCard

      void dealerOpensCard(Card opened)
      Called when dealer opens his closed card. Happens right after `dealerTurnStarted`.
      Parameters:
      opened - - card that was opened

    • cardIsDealtToDealer

      void cardIsDealtToDealer(Card dealt)
      Called every time card is dealt to dealer.
      Parameters:
      dealt - - card that was dealt to dealer

    • dealerTurnEnded

      void dealerTurnEnded()
      Called when dealer's turn ends.

    • roundEnded

      void roundEnded()
      Called when round ends. `state.currentRound` is the number of the round that is ending.

    • playerWon

      void playerWon()
      Called right after `roundEnded` if the player won.

    • dealerWon

      void dealerWon()
      Called right after `roundEnded` if the dealer won.

    • tie

      void tie()
      Called right after `roundEnded` if the game ended in a tie.
